title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Heavy Division B78XH - Workaround for IFR clearance issue
description:
In this video we will look how to work around the issue that you cannot request IFR clearance when importing the flightplan directly from Simbrief when using the B78XH. The workaround is not ideal but at least you can request IFR clearance again.
